attributes.action: End The Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ)
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to recognise the huge negative impact ULEZ has brought to it’s constituents.

ULEZ is a tax on the poorest in our society. Not only is it unjust and immoral it has also hurt businesses within the Greater London area, especially with the new ULEZ expansion. This has created increased destitution within London as people flee the ULEZ zone and move themselves and their business elsewhere.
attributes.background: Start a discussion around the termination of the Ultra Low Emissions Zone (ULEZ) in London & surrounding areas.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
